20110109190424.000|20110109190427.000|TR0|very good possibility of that.  There have

20110109190523.000|20110109190526.000|TR0|to the viewers what you guys are doing?
20110109190526.000|20110109190528.000|TR0|
20110109190528.000|20110109190531.000|TR0|JOHN PRENDERGAST, CO-FOUNDER, THE ENOUGH 
20110109190531.000|20110109190533.000|TR0|PROJECT:  Well, the idea is to try to 
20110109190533.000|20110109190535.000|TR0|prevent human rights abuses before they 
20110109190535.000|20110109190538.000|TR0|occur, by shining a spotlight on the 
20110109190538.000|20110109190540.000|TR0|places - on the locations along the border 
20110109190540.000|20110109190543.000|TR0|between the north and the south where the 
20110109190543.000|20110109190545.000|TR0|possibility exists that if there is 
20110109190545.000|20110109190548.000|TR0|conflict, if there is a crisis that will 
20110109190548.000|20110109190550.000|TR0|erupt it will be in those places, and the 
20110109190550.000|20110109190553.000|TR0|idea is if we can put a spotlight on those 
20110109190553.000|20110109190555.000|TR0|areas, and ensure that photography, that 
20110109190555.000|20110109190557.000|TR0|satellite imagery, 24, 48 hours after the 
20110109190557.000|20110109190600.000|TR0|fact, can be beamed around the world, if 
20110109190600.000|20110109190602.000|TR0|there's large-scale troop movements, if 
20110109190602.000|20110109190605.000|TR0|there are movements of tanks, if there are 
20110109190605.000|20110109190607.000|TR0|other kinds of provocative actions or 
20110109190607.000|20110109190610.000|TR0|offensive actions, if those can be 
20110109190610.000|20110109190612.000|TR0|broadcast around the world, perhaps it 
20110109190612.000|20110109190615.000|TR0|will have a deterrent value.
20110109190615.000|20110109190617.000|TR0|
20110109190617.000|20110109190620.000|TR0|So our goal with this Satellite Sentinel

20110109191504.000|20110109191506.000|TR0|Taseer, a popular progressive politician, 
20110109191506.000|20110109191509.000|TR0|the governor of Punjab, the heart of 
20110109191509.000|20110109191511.000|TR0|Pakistan, its most popular state, was
